title: Is reading Pratiyogita Darpan knowledgeable? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my opinion, it is knowledge as well as helpful in cracking almost all the govt. exams. It contains all the important events of the month which you should know. Several topics are there for upsc aspirants. The book is designed in a way that it helps in understanding the facts easier all well as less time consuming (weekly planning should be done). So, for knowledge it is helpful as well as interesting. If you want to give any govt exam it is must for you but if not you can also read it for gaining knowledge it appears as a vital source of knowledge..
